comments: T(i,j) is the number of i-permutations of 10 objects a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j with repetition allowed, containing j a's. - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 21 2007Reflected version of A013616. - _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 19 2008
references: B. N. Cyvin et al., Isomer enumeration of unbranched catacondensed polygonal systems with pentagons and heptagons, Match, No. 34 (Oct 1996), pp. 109-121.
maple: for i from 0 to 9 do seq(binomial(i, j)*9^(i-j), j = 0 .. i) od; # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 21 2007
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
